attributes.action: KEEP CHASE FARM ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY FROM CLOSURE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM has caterogically ignored the local peoples voices and by taking the irresponsible decision in setting a timeline to close the A&E has put the lives of many local people at risk. The A&E at Chase Farm hospital is a very busy department and is very well used, the 2 other local hospitals would be under a great strain to cope in Chase Farm goes. Please let common sense prevail and lets reverse the decision to in order to save lives.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "keep chase farm accident and emergency from closure."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22363


Prime Minister's Office
